name: Sick Monkeys
description:
Program a nano-robot to stop twisted parodies of sea monkeys from infecting your insides.

Ramming the eggs or the bugs works, but there's also a pulse attack for longer range. however, it takes away energy...

How did this nonsense happen? Think about it, because they want answers...

Sick Monkeys is a small horror game made for Halloween 2022. All the graphics where done by editing photos of doodles and random objects, and the sound effects by editing recordings of heavy breathing and guttural noises.
